13533222221.title: The Dark Sorceress, Cia.

choices: Cia decides to start swapping straight away.
Cia wants to tell Lana about the wand first.
135332222212.content:
Cia looked around her as she walked into the Valley of Seers. Lana, who was walking alongside Cia, turned to her and smiled.

“Well, we’re home,” said Lana, though her smile faded slightly when she saw Cia was struggling slightly. “How are you feeling?”

“I... I’m fine,” said Cia. “Just a little winded, is all.”

“Are you sure?”

“I’m sure,” said Cia. “I guess I’m still recovering from our battle with Phantom Ganon.”

“Well, if you need anything, I’m here for you,” Lana said.

“I appreciate that,” Cia said, with a smile. “Thank you.”

Cia walked over to a nearby boulder and sat down to catch her breath. “You go on ahead. I’ll catch up in a minute.”

“Okay,” said Lana. “I’ll see you inside.”

Cia smiled at Lana as the blue-haired sorceress headed up the steps towards the ruins, but her smile soon faded from her face. She still couldn’t believe that she was alive again, or that Link and Zelda had been so willing to forgive her. Lana’s forgiveness hadn’t been surprising, as she was the goodness that Cia had cast out of herself when she had been corrupted by Ganondorf’s darkness. Seeing Link come to her aid in the Temple of Souls, despite everything she’d done, simply because she’d needed protection...

Cia sighed, and held up her right hand. A glowing golden triangle formed, hovering above the palm of her hand. Lana had given her the Triforce of Power after Phantom Ganon had been defeated, and Link, Zelda and Lana had all agreed to let Cia keep it after healing the land of Hyrule. She had expected that Zelda, at least, would’ve protested letting Cia keep the Triforce of Power, but she hadn’t said a word. Link and Zelda’s faith in Lana’s opinion of Cia was truly staggering, and Cia felt like she could never repay such kindness.

As the Triforce of Power faded back into her hand, Cia spotted something in the dirt at her feet. It was a blue wand of some sort, with a red gem at one end. Both Cia and Lana had a vast collection of magic items and weaponry, but this wand wasn’t one Cia recognised.

“What is this?” Cia asked as she reached down to pick up the wand. As soon as her fingers brushed against the surface of the wand, her mind was flooded with knowledge about the powers of the Swap Wand, and how to access those powers.

“By the Goddesses,” Cia whispered as she realised how much power she had at her fingertips.

What did Cia do first?
135332222212.title: A redeemed Cia finds the Swap Wand.

choices: Lana gives the wand back to Cia.
Lana wants to use the wand on Cia.
Lana wants to use the wand on someone else.
1353322222122.content:
Cia was sorely tempted to test the wand out immediately, but she knew that this sort of power could quite easily go to her head. That said, she definitely wanted to try the wand out, but it might be better if she had someone who was willing to test it with her. Lana, for example, might be just as interested in the swap wand as Cia herself was, and would be just as eager to test it out. Her decision made, Cia carefully pocketed the swap wand, then headed inside to find her counterpart.

Cia found Lana quickly enough. Lana was standing in front of the crystal ball Cia had used to observe the many periods of history and divergent timelines of Hyrule. As Cia approached, Lana looked up at her and smiled.

“Hey,” said Lana. “What’s up?”

“I found this outside,” Cia said as she took out the swap wand. “Do you have any idea what it is?”

Lana frowned as she looked at the swap wand. “No, I don’t think I’ve seen anything like it. Mind if I have a closer look?”

“Here,” said Cia, holding the wand out to Lana. Lana took the wand, and her eyes went wide as she did so.

“Whoa,” said Lana quietly. “Did... you see all that, too?”

“You mean, the knowledge of the Swap Wand?” said Cia. “Yes, I did.”

“This is incredible,” said Lana. “Have you tried it out yet?”

“No, not yet,” said Cia. “I didn’t trust myself enough with that kind of power, not after... well, you know.”

“I see,” said Lana, looking at the wand as she turned it over in her hands.

What did Lana do next?
1353322222122.title: Cia tells Lana about the Swap Wand.

choices: Cia uses the wand on Lana.
Cia uses the wand on one of Lana's allies.
Cia uses the wand on a character from another time.
13533222221221.content:
“Here,” said Lana, holding the swap wand out to Cia. “I think this belongs to you.”

“You want me to have it?” asked Cia, shocked.

“You found it, didn’t you?” said Lana. “A magic artifact with this much power... it feels almost like it has a mind of its own.”

“You think the swap wand chose me to wield it?” asked Cia. “But why?”

“I don’t know,” said Lana. “Maybe it just likes you?”

“That’s a silly reason for it to pick me,” Cia said with a soft giggle.

“Ha ha, yeah, you’re right,” said Lana. “But I still want you to have it.”

“Thank you, Lana,” Cia said as she accepted the swap wand from Lana. “I’m glad you trust me so much.”

“Of course I trust you,” said Lana. “We’re sisters, aren’t we?”

“Yes... yes, I suppose we are,” Cia said.

“So, do you have any ideas for who you want to use the swap wand on?” Lana asked.
13533222221221.title: Lana gives the wand back to Cia.

choices: Lana is aware of the swap.
Lana is unaware of the swap.
135332222212211.content:
“Actually, I was hoping to use the wand on you, if that’s alright,” Cia said.

“Sure,” said Lana. “I can’t wait to see what you have in mind.”

“Okay,” said Cia, raising the wand. “Here we go.”

Cia waved the wand, and there was a bright flash of light. When the light faded, Cia looked over Lana. Lana was still dressed in the same clothes she normally wore, but her white and blue clothing was now a deep purple that was nearly black, with a few red highlights. Lana’s blue hair was now also white, the same colour that Cia’s hair normally was.

https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/zelda_gam...

Cia then looked down at herself, and saw that her clothes were now blue, with a few white highlights. Cia looked at the tattoo on her left leg, and saw that it was now white, as opposed to the regular red. A few strands of hair fell into her eyes, and Cia noticed that her hair was now the bright blue colour of Lana’s hair.

https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/zelda_gam...

“It worked,” Cia said, staring at the wand in amazement. She’d just used the wand to swap the colours of her clothes with the colours of Lana’s clothes, and had also swapped their hair colours as well.

How does Lana react to the swap?

“Wow,” said Lana as she checked out the colour of her new clothes. “This is so weird.” She then looked up at Cia, and giggled slightly. “I like your new hair.”

Cia cheeks went red, and she brushed her now blue hair out of her eyes. “To be honest, I wasn’t sure this sort of swap would work,” said Cia. “And I wasn’t sure if you’d be aware of the swap, either.”

“Yeah, I’m a bit surprised about that, too,” said Lana. “I think that, because I touched the wand earlier, it made me aware of the swaps as well.”

“I think that seems to be the case, as well,” said Cia. “Now that we know the wand works, do you want to swap back?”

135332222212211122.title: Cia swaps with someone from another time.

1353322222122111223.content:
Cia waved her hand, and a ghostly image appeared within the crystal ball. Inside the ball, Cia could see the fields of Hyrule as they had appeared during the Era of Twilight. Cia had visited that time period during her invasion of Hyrule, and had recruited Zant, the insane Usurper King of the Twilight Realm. Lana had followed her to the Era of Twilight, and she had joined forces with Midna, the true Princess of the Twilight Realm, and Agitha, a young girl who proclaimed herself the Princess of Insects. Cia waved her hand again, and images of the three appeared within the crystal ball.

“The Era of Twilight,” said Lana, watching the images in the crystal ball. “Didn’t think that would be your first choice.”

“Lana, I... I’m sorry for what happened,” Cia said. “I...”

“I know,” said Lana. “And that wasn’t you. You were under Ganondorf’s sway.”

Cia smiled weakly at Lana, then turned her attention back to the images currently floating in the crystal ball. Midna was riding on the back of a Shadow Wolf in the Twilight Realm, Agitha was holding her hand out as a butterfly landed on her finger, and Zant was swinging one of his scimitars wildly. 1353322222222.content: Is the wand found by Linkle, the Cucco farmer that believes she's the legendary hero?
1353322222222.title: More Choices

13533222222221.content:
Linkle had spent the last few months travelling across Hyrule, having made her way across the country when she’d heard that Hyrule Castle was under attack by a huge army of monsters. She’d been seeking the opportunity to prove herself as the legendary hero by helping drive back the monsters. Her journey had taken her throughout Hyrule, where she’d encountered all sorts of strange monsters and enemies, before she finally arrived at Hyrule Castle, and helped fight off an army of monsters. Once the battle was over, she’d been taken to meet Princess Zelda herself, as well as Link. Link’s fairy companion, Proxi, had gently explained that Link was the hero of legend, but both Link and Princess Zelda had told her that she didn’t need to be a legendary hero, as she was a hero in her own right. Linkle had been a little disappointed that she wasn’t the legendary hero, but being thanked by Princess Zelda for saving the lives of everyone at Hyrule Castle more than made up for it.

Linkle smiled as she her Cucco farm in the distance. She’d missed this place while she was travelling, and it was great to be back home. However, she wasn’t sure she’d be able to settle down after the excitement of the last few months.

Linkle’s boot got caught on something sticking out of the path, and she cried out in surprise as she tripped and fell. She pushed herself back up to her feet and dusted herself off, looking around for what had tripped her. While she didn’t see any rocks or tree roots, she did see what looked like some sort of wand.

“What’s this?” Linkle asked as she knelt down to pick the item up. As soon as her fingers touched it, her mind was flooded with information about the Swap Wand, and what it could do.

“Wow,” said Linkle softly. “This could be fun. But who should I swap with first?”
13533222222221.title: Linkle (Hyrule Warriors)

135332222222212.content: Who does Linkle swap with?
135332222222212.title: Someone else

1353322222222123.content: Who does Linkle swap with?
1353322222222123.title: Someone else.

13533222222221233.content: Who does Linkle swap with?

Use the wand on someone else.
135332222222212333.content:
Linkle huffed in annoyance. There were so many people she could swap with, but she couldn’t make up her mind on who to use the wand on, or even what she’d swap with them.

“This is going to be harder than I thought,” Linkle said, turning the wand over in her hands.

Linkle’s mind wandered to all the people she’d helped during her journey across Hyrule, but none of them struck her as people she wanted to swap with.

She was brought out of her thoughts by the sound of clucking. Linkle looked down, and saw a white Cucco pecking at the ground, looking for insects to eat.

“Hey, little guy,” Linkle said, kneeling down next to the Cucco. “Aren’t you a little far from home?”

Linkle held her arms out, and the Cucco jumped into her arms. She picked the Cucco up, and the Cucco clucked happily. That was when an idea struck Linkle. If the wand worked on animals, maybe she could swap something with the Cucco she was carrying.

13533222222221233311.content:
There was a bright flash as the wand worked its magic. Once the light faded, Linkle looked at the Cucco in her arms. The Cucco was now dressed in Linkle’s clothes, including the green hood over her head, the compass hanging from a chain around her neck, and a pair of tiny crossbows strapped to her legs. Linkle laughed at the sight, or at least, she tried to. However, instead of laughter, all that came out of her mouth was a clucking sound!

“What’s wrong?” said the Cucco Linkle was still carrying, causing Linkle to stare at the Cucco in shock. The Cucco was speaking with her voice!

“Wow, did the wand do this?” Linkle tried to ask, but she simply started clucking again.

“Come on,” said the Cucco. She jumped out of Linkle’s arm, and started walking towards Linkle’s Cucco farm. Linkle followed the Cucco, and as she did, she looked at the wand she was still carrying.

So, I guess I swapped lives with that Cucco, Linkle thought. Now everyone thinks I’m a Cucco, and that the Cucco is me. And since I’m a Cucco, that means I can’t talk, but the Cucco can, since she’s living a Hylian life.

Linkle followed the Cucco back to her farm, and watched as the Cucco walked up to the door of Linkle’s house. Linkle clucked with laughter as she watched the Cucco jump up and grab the door handle with her beak. The Cucco entered Linkle’s house and shut the door behind her, so Linkle decided to go enter the Cucco coop and see if things had changed.

As she got closer to the coop, she didn’t notice anything different from the outside. Once she entered, however, she saw that, alongside all the regular sized Cucco nests, there was a large nest that was just the right size for a Hylian.

This must be my nest, thought Linkle. She sat down in the nest, and to her surprise, it was actually quite comfortable.

Linkle clucked happily a few times as she settled into her nest. Apart from being naked and unable to talk, being a Cucco didn’t seem to be too bad. Of course, with the swap wand, she could easily get her clothes or her voice back, simply by waving the wand.
13533222222221233311.title: Linkle swapped lives with the Cucco.

choices: Linkle went out to eat some Cucco food.
Linkle stayed in her nest to have a nap.
Linkle decided to use the Swap Wand.
135332222222212333113.content:
Linkle’s eyes went wide, and she clucked in alarm as she felt a strange pressure building up inside her. It almost felt like she needed to go to the toilet, but Linkle knew that it was something completely different.

Instinctively, she shifted her feet so that she was squatting over her nest, and she felt muscles inside her contracting, and felt something smooth being pushed out of her vagina. She squawked loudly, and there was a strangely satisfying plop as she felt the smooth object being expelled from her body. Once she had finished, Linkle looked down between her legs. As she suspected, she had just laid an egg, much like a Cucco would. However, the egg was much larger than a regular Cucco egg.

As she looked at the egg, she felt a bizarre mixture of distaste and maternal pride. Linkle was very disturbed by the fact that her body seemed to have been altered so that she could lay eggs, but she also felt quite proud of herself for successfully laying the egg. She honestly couldn’t decide whether or not it she liked it or not.

Linkle felt the pressure building up again, and shifted slightly so that she was more comfortable. She felt another egg being pushed out of her vagina, though this time, it was much easier for her to handle. After that, she laid another egg, and another. Finally, she stopped laying, and Linkle looked down between her legs. She counted seven eggs in total, and another strange surge of maternal pride filled her. While she still found it weird that she could lay eggs, she was very pleased with herself. After all, seven eggs was no easy feat, even for a normal Cucco.

Linkle let out a tired cluck, and she felt a pang of hunger. Laying so many eggs had been surprisingly exhausting. She knew that there was a feeder full of Cucco food outside, and if her body had been altered to lay eggs, it had probably been altered that the Cucco food would taste good. Or she could simply take a nap, to try and recover her strength.

Linkle picked up the wand, which she’d dropped when she had started laying eggs. Maybe she could use the wand to swap back into her own life, or even swap something else...
135332222222212333113.title: Something else happened...

choices: The Swap Wand is still there.
1353322222222123331132.content:
Linkle clucked tiredly again. She ultimately decided she’d rather take a nap now, as she didn’t think her hunger was too bad. Linkle carefully tucked the wand into the straw at the back of her nest, where it would hopefully not be noticed. She then moved back, then leaned forward, so that her belly was covering her eggs. She didn’t normally sleep on her stomach, but her instincts were telling her this was the best way to protect her eggs, so she decided to listen to them. Linkle gently rested her belly on her eggs, and felt the smooth shells pressing into her stomach. Once she had covered her eggs, she closed her eyes and drifted off to sleep.



A few hours later, Linkle awoke with a clucking yawn. She sat up and stretched her arms, and felt straw sticking to her. She briefly wondered why she had fallen asleep naked in the Cucco coop, then remembered about the swap she had performed with the wand. Linkle looked down, and saw that the seven eggs she had laid earlier were gone.

The Cucco living my life must have taken my eggs, Linkle thought. Hopefully, when she took my eggs, she didn’t find the wand.

Linkle pulled apart the straw at the back of her nest, looking for the wand.
1353322222222123331132.title: Linkle stayed in her nest to have a nap.

choices: Linkle swaps with the Cucco living in her life.
13533222222221233311321.content:
Linkle clucked in relief as she picked up the wand. Thankfully, the Cucco living in her life hadn’t found the wand while she’d collected Linkle’s eggs.

Now that she had rested for a few hours, Linkle felt much better, and decided to give the Swap Wand another go. The only question was, who did she swap with?
13533222222221233311321.title: The Swap Wand is still there.

choices: Linkle swapped lives with the Cucco again.
Linkle swapped bodies with the Cucco.
Linkle swapped something else with the Cucco...
135332222222212333113211.content: Linkle figured she could swap with the Cucco she’d swapped lives with earlier. She considered swapping lives again, so she could get her own life back and the Cucco could go back to being a Cucco. Of course, she could swap a few other things with the Cucco. For example, she could swap bodies with the Cucco. That way, she’d have a Cucco’s life and a Cucco’s body, while the Cucco would have her life and her body. Or, she could swap something else...
135332222222212333113211.title: Linkle swaps with the Cucco living in her life.

choices: Linkle experiments with the Swap Wand.
Linkle puts the Swap Wand away for now.
1353322222222123331132111.content:
Linkle clucked a sigh. As much as she had enjoyed being a Cucco, she figured it was time to go back to being her regular self again. She waved the wand, and there was a bright flash. When Linkle’s vision cleared, she was sitting on her bed in her room, with her compass in one hand and the Swap Wand in the other. She was also back in her clothes, though her hood was resting on the bed, and her crossbows were hanging on their hooks on the wall. She put her compass down and examined the wand again.

“This thing is amazing,” said Linkle quietly, then giggled happily when she realised she had her voice back. “I wonder what else it can do?”
1353322222222123331132111.title: Linkle swapped lives with the Cucco again.

choices: The Swap Wand made permanent changes to Linkle's body.
Linkle had swapped reproductive systems with the Cucco.
13533222222221233311321113.content:
Linkle sighed, and flopped backwards onto her bed. Once again, she felt stuck, unable to decide who to use the wand on.

As she lay back on her bed and stared at the ceiling, she felt something strange. It was like pressure in her pelvic region, but she didn’t feel like she needed to go to the toilet...

“Huh?!” Linkle cried out in alarm as she sat up. “But I’m not a Cucco anymore!”

Thinking quickly, Linkle climbed onto her bed and squatted, pulling down her shorts and panties in order to expose her vagina. Using her experience as a Cucco, she contracted the right muscles, and easily pushed an egg out onto her bed. Thankfully, the pressure subsided immediately after, so Linkle pulled her panties and shorts back up. Once she was dressed again, she carefully climbed off her bed, and picked up the egg that was sitting on her bed.

“I don’t get it,” said Linkle as she examined the egg in her hands. “Why am I still laying eggs? Are the changes the wand made to my body permanent? Or did I somehow swap reproductive systems with that Cucco?”
13533222222221233311321113.title: Something strange happened...

choices: Linkle decides to visit a neighbouring farm.
Linkle decides to swap with a Hylian instead.
Linkle decides to do something else instead...
135332222222212333113211131.content:
With the wand in one hand, and her egg in the other, Linkle tried to figure out what exactly had happened to her. She had her old life back now, which meant that she shouldn’t be laying eggs anymore. But for some reason, she had just laid an egg, which was baffling.

“When I was a Cucco, I needed to lay eggs,” Linkle mused to herself. “Laying eggs is an important part of a Cucco’s life, after all. The wand must’ve altered my body so that I could lay eggs while I was a Cucco. But why would I still be laying eggs as a Hylian?”

Linkle was tempted to try swapping with the Cucco again, but she held back. She wasn’t sure how she knew, but she was certain that she had successfully undone the life swap with the Cucco. In fact, Linkle was starting to remember a life where she’d always laid eggs. She knew those memories were being created by the wand, and she could still remember her original life, where she didn’t lay eggs. It seemed that if the wand had to change someone’s body to make them fit a new life, those changes remained in place when the swap was undone. Maybe it was a side effect of swapping with an animal, instead of with another Hylian.

“Well, if the wand has changed me so that I’ve always laid eggs... I guess that’s not a bad thing,” said Linkle with a shrug. It was weird, but something about that very weirdness excited her. The idea of being an egg-laying Hylian was oddly appealing to her.

“I think I can live with this,” said Linkle. “I mean, it’s not like I have much choice.”

Linkle gently set her egg down back on her bed, and turned her attention back to the wand. Maybe she could try a few experiments. There were other farms nearby. What other weird side effects might occur if she swapped a Hylian with a different animal? Or maybe she should just stick to swapping with Hylians?
135332222222212333113211131.title: Linkle now permanently lays eggs.

choices: Linkle doesn't make any swaps yet.
1353322222222123331132111311.content:
Linkle ultimately decided to visit the neighbouring farm and try another swap. She pocketed the wand, then put her egg away with the rest of the Cucco eggs she collected. Once her egg was stored, Linkle headed off down the road.

After a few minutes of walking, she reached Lon Lon Ranch, the dairy farm next to hers. Lon Lon Ranch belonged to a man named Talon, who worked the ranch with his daughter Malon. The two of them sold their milk in town, and Linkle often traded Cucco eggs for Lon Lon Milk with Malon, who was a good friend.

As she walked up to the Ranch house, she could see Malon outside, sitting on a stool and playing a song on her ocarina. As Malon came to the end of her song, she looked up and saw Linkle approaching.

“Linkle! You’re back!” Malon said as she stood up and held her arms out for a hug.

“Hi Malon!” said Linkle, hugging Malon. “It’s good to be home again.”

“So, how was your adventure?” Malon asked. “I heard you went all the way to Hyrule Castle to fight against those monsters.”

“Yeah, it’s a long story,” said Linkle. “I can’t wait to tell you about it.”

“I can’t wait to hear it,” said Malon. “Come on!”

Malon took Linkle by the hand and started dragging her towards the barn.

“Why are we going to the barn?” Linkle asked.

“Because that’s where Dad is,” said Malon. “I’m pretty sure you don’t want to tell the story twice, right?”

Linkle laughed. “No, I guess not.”

Malon led Linkle over to the barn next to the Ranch house, and the two walked through the open doors. As they entered, Linkle spotted Talon sitting on a stool, milking one of the cows.

Linkle slipped her free hand into her pocket and closed her fingers around the wand. Malon wasn’t paying attention to her right now, and Talon was obviously busy. If she wanted to perform a swap, now would be the time to do it.
1353322222222123331132111311.title: Linkle decides to visit Lon Lon Ranch.

choices: Swap something between Malon and Talon.
Swap something between Malon and the cow.
Swap something between Talon and the cow.
13533222222221233311321113111.content: Linkle gripped the wand tightly. She was definitely going to make a swap now. The only question was, who was getting swapped? Malon, Talon, or the cow?
13533222222221233311321113111.title: Linkle makes a swap now.

choices: Linkle undoes the swap between Malon and the cow.
Linkle leaves Malon and the cow swapped.
135332222222212333113211131112.content:
Linkle twitched the wand in her pocket as she thought of the swap she had in mind. Specifically, she wanted Malon and the cow that was in the barn to swap lives. All of a sudden, Malon was no longer standing next to her. Instead, the cow that Talon had been milking was now walking beside her, and was dressed in Malon’s clothing. She then looked over at where the cow had been standing, and her eyes nearly popped out of her head. Malon was standing where the cow had been standing, and was completely naked. Linkle had been expecting that. What Linkle hadn’t been expecting was the udder that was now dangling from Malon’s belly. Talon hummed to himself as he tugged at the teats of his daughter’s udder. Malon mooed as milk squirted out of her udder.

Linkle looked between Malon, blissfully unaware that she was living a cow’s life, and the cow that was now living Malon’s life. The cow was equally unaware that she was living the life of a Hylian. And once again, the wand had radically altered someone’s body. Since Malon was living the life of a dairy cow, she needed to be milked. And, in order to be milked like a cow, she needed an udder, so the wand had given her an udder.

Linkle felt a twinge of guilt. It was one thing to swap her own life with an animal. It was another thing entirely to do the same to her best friend. Maybe she should undo the swap...
135332222222212333113211131112.title: Swap something between Malon and the cow.

1353322222222123331132111311121.content:
Linkle’s guilt won, and she flicked the wand in her pocket again. As suddenly as it had occurred, the swap was undone. The cow was back in the stall, being milked by Talon, who was still blissfully unaware of their presence. Malon was also back where she had been before, standing next to Linkle. Malon was back in her clothes, but Linkle noticed a large bulge under her skirt that was large enough to be her udder.

“Dad! Linkle’s back!” Malon called out, causing Talon to look over his shoulder at the two women.

“Well, I’ll be,” Talon said. “Welcome back.”

“Hi, Talon,” said Linkle. “It’s nice to see you again.”

“You were gone for quite a while,” said Talon as he turned back to the cow he was milking. “You must have some stories to tell.”

“Yep,” said Linkle, as Malon walked over to where some stools had been stacked up. “I went all the way to Hyrule Castle and back, and met all sorts of people.”

“Sounds like quite the adventure,” said Malon as she walked back over, carrying two stools. “I can’t wait to hear it.”

“Neither can I,” said Talon. “I’ll join you two in a minute. Just let me finish the milking.”

“That’s fine,” said Linkle as Malon set the stools down. Linkle sat down on one of the stools, while Malon walked back over to where the furniture was stacked up.

“There’s no rush,” said Malon as she picked up a bucket. “I still haven’t milked myself today.”

“Are you sure you want to do that now?” Linkle asked.

“It’s fine,” said Malon as she set the bucket down and hitched her skirt up, exposing her udder. “I always milk myself at this time of day. Besides, it’s not like you haven’t seen me do it before.”

As Malon said that, Linkle felt new memories forming inside her mind. She could indeed remember watching Malon milking herself, even though that had never actually happened.

Linkle watched in fascination as Malon sat down and began massaging the teats of her udder. Milk began to dribble out of the teats slowly, then more and more began squirting out as Malon continued milking herself. Malon groaned happily as milk poured out of her udder and into the bucket at her feet. After a few minutes, the bucket was almost full, and Malon slumped back with a sigh.

“Whoo,” Malon said. “That’s much better.”

Over at the milking stall, Talon stood up and picked up the bucket of milk at his feet. He then walked over to Malon, and picked up the bucket she’d filled up.

“Thanks, Dad,” Malon said as Talon carried the two buckets away. He then emptied the two buckets of milk into a large metal tank, and sealed the tank shut.

“There we go,” said Talon as he put the empty buckets down and walked back over to Linkle and Malon. “Now, then... let’s hear about this journey of yours, Linkle.”

“Well, it all started a few months ago, when I heard Hyrule Castle was under attack...” said Linkle as she began telling Malon and Talon everything about her adventures, and all the friends she’d made.

About half an hour into her story, when she was talking about her adventure with Ruto and Darunia at the time-displaced Lake Hylia, Linkle realised that Malon and Talon were distracted enough that she could use the wand on them if she so desired...
1353322222222123331132111311121.title: Linkle undoes the swap between Malon and the cow.

choices: Linkle tells Malon about the Swap Wand.
Linkle keeps quiet about the Swap Wand.
Before she can decide, Talon interrupts Linkle.
13533222222221233311321113111212.content:
Linkle ultimately decided against doing another swap. She figured that the swaps she’d already performed were enough for now.

Linkle continued to tell her story, and Malon and Talon both listened in fascination. After a while, Linkle reached the end of her tale.

“Wow,” said Malon. “That sounds amazing!”

“You went on quite the adventure, didn’t you?” said Talon. “Made lots of new friends, too, by the sound of things.”

“Yep!” said Linkle with a smile. “Travelling across Hyrule was lots of fun, but I think I’ll be happy staying here, at least for a while.”

“For a while?” asked Talon. “Planning on leaving the farm again?”

“Maybe, someday,” said Linkle. “Not any time soon, though.”

“I’d love to go with you next time,” Malon said. “As much as I know I’m needed here on the Ranch, I wouldn’t mind seeing more of Hyrule some day.”

“Well, if this new farmhand works out, I think I’ll be able to manage the Ranch without you,” said Talon. “Then you’d be able to go with Linkle, the next time she gets the urge to travel.”

“And I’d love to take Malon with me,” said Linkle. “It’s a lot more fun, travelling with a friend.”

“Oh, thank you!” said Malon, leaning over and hugging her father.

“It’s nothing,” said Talon with a blush. “Now, if you’ll excuse me, I need to finish bottling up the milk.”

“Do you need a hand?” Malon asked as her father stood up.

“No, I’m sure I’ll manage,” said Talon. “You and Linkle enjoy yourselves.”

“We will,” said Linkle, standing up as well. Malon also stood up, and the two young women made their way out of the barn as Talon git back to work.

“I still can’t believe it,” said Malon as she and Linkle left the barn. “Your adventure sounds like it was amazing!”

“Yeah, it was,” said Linkle. “And thanks for looking after the Cuccos for me while I was away.”

“You’re welcome,” said Malon. “It was nice to work with something other than cows for a change.”

“Uh huh,” said Linkle with a nod.

As she and Malon walked, Linkle began to wonder if she should tell Malon about the wand in her pocket. But would Malon believe her, though? Malon currently believed that she’d had an udder for her entire life, even though Linkle knew that she’d only gained it earlier that day. Would it be fair for Linkle to shatter that illusion for Malon? And if Malon really did want to know about her life without an udder, how would Linkle make her aware? Could she use the wand to somehow make Malon aware of the changes? However, Linkle had only learned what the wand was capable of when she first picked it up. Would Malon need to touch the wand herself to become aware of what it could do?

“Linkle?” said Malon, waving a hand in front of Linkle’s face. “Is something wrong?”

“Huh?” said Linkle. “Oh, nothing’s wrong. I was just... thinking.”

“About what?” Malon asked.

“Well, uh...” said Linkle.
13533222222221233311321113111212.title: Linkle doesn't make another swap.

choices: Malon believes Linkle about the swap wand.
Malon wants to see a swap first-hand.
Malon tries to steal the wand from Linkle!
135332222222212333113211131112121.content:
“Actually, there’s... something I wanted to show you,” said Linkle. “But you have to keep it a secret.”

“A secret?” asked Malon. “What is it?”

“Do you promise to keep it a secret if I show you?” Linkle asked.

“Of course,” said Malon, nodding.

“Okay,” said Linkle as she reached into her pocket. “The secret is... this.”

Linkle slowly pulled out the wand, being careful to not wave it in any way.

“It... looks like some sort of wand,” said Malon slowly. “Why do want me to keep it a secret?”

“Because this isn’t any ordinary magic wand,” said Linkle. “If I use this wand, I can swap something, anything I want, between two people, and nobody will ever notice the difference.”

“Really?” Malon asked.

“It’s true,” said Linkle. “It works, trust me.”

“I see...” said Malon, looking at the wand in Linkle’s hands.
135332222222212333113211131112121.title: Linkle tells Malon about the Swap Wand.

choices: Linkle lets Malon touch the wand
Linkle doesn't let Malon touch the wand
Something interrupts before Link can decide
1353322222222123331132111311121211.content:
"Wow, this is amazing, Linkle!" Malon said excitedly. Her eyes were full of wonder, completely believing Linkle's story. "Where did you find it?"

"Oh, I just stumbled across it on the way home," Linkle replied. It sounded very underwhelming when she said it aloud.

Malon seemed to agree. "Oh, that's it?" Clearly she expected Linkle to have freed this magical artifact from the depths of some ancient dungeon or something after the story she'd told of the grand adventure she'd been on. "And you're sure it works? How did you find out what it does?" Doubt was starting to creep into her expression.

"Yeah, it definitely works. I tested it a couple times just to try it out. And I know what it does because... well, it just sorta knew the moment I touched it." She was aware of how sketchy her story sounded, but she could think of no other way to describe it. When she reached out to touch it for the first time, her mind had just been filled with the knowledge of how it worked.

"I see..." Malon hummed, thinking over Linkle's story. It wasn't that she didn't trust her friend, of course, but it just sounded a mite unbelievable, especially to a farmhand like her with no real knowledge of magic. She was sure Linkle wouldn't lie to her, though. "Then, do you think I'd be able to touch it too?" Even if Linkle wasn't lying, she still thought it might be good to learn about the wand the same way Linkle did, just in case she'd missed anything.

Linkle hesitated slightly. While the wand had granted her knowledge of how it worked, there were some things about this situation that were still a mystery. She had told Malon about the wand in the first place so the two of them could have fun with it together, and having Malon learn firsthand how the wand worked, instead of hearing Linkle's recount, would be the easiest way to let her in on everything. However, when Linkle had found the remote, nothing had yet been swapped, as far as she knew at least. That was not the case now. Though everyone was back in their own lives, Linkle's prior swaps had left her able to lay eggs, and had given Malon an udder. As far as Malon knew, these were completely normal, because she wasn't the one using the wand. What would happen if she touched the wand now? Would she become aware of everything the wand had done, suddenly forcing her to realise that her udder wasn't as normal as she believed, or would she still think it normal and simply receive the same knowledge Linkle had? How would Malon react if she found out her udder wasn't normal? It wasn't as if Linkle knew how to remove it after the life swap had put it onto her. It was a bit of a risk, though if she truly wanted to enjoy the wand alongside Malon, then perhaps it was a risk she'd need to take.
1353322222222123331132111311121211.title: Malon believes Linkle about the swap wand.

choices: Malon only learns about the powers of the wand.
Malon becomes aware of the other changes as well.
Nothing happens, Malon doesn't learn anything.
13533222222221233311321113111212111.content:
“Well... okay,” Linkle said after a brief internal struggle. “Here.”

Linkle held the swap wand up towards Malon, and Malon began to reach out towards the wand, then stopped.

“How long did it take for the wand to, um, teach you what it could do?” Malon asked.

“Well, for me, it happened as soon as I touched the wand,” said Linkle. “As soon as I picked it up, I just knew what the wand could do.”

“Okay,” said Malon. “Well, here goes...”

Linkle swallowed nervously. While what she had said was true, this was a slightly different situation. Linkle now laid eggs, and Malon now had an udder. Would the wand make Malon aware of those accidental changes as well? Or would it simply fill Malon’s mind with the same knowledge it had given her? Or, maybe the wand wouldn’t do anything. Maybe the wand would only give its knowledge to the first person who found it, and Malon wouldn’t learn anything.

As all these thoughts travelled through Linkle’s mind, Malon reached out towards the wand again. And as Malon’s fingers closed around the swap wand...
13533222222221233311321113111212111.title: Linkle lets Malon touch the wand

choices: Malon is quite upset about having an udder.
Surprisingly, Malon is okay with her udder.
135332222222212333113211131112121112.content:
Malon gasped as her fingers gripped the wand in Linkle’s hand.

“Whoa,” Malon said, her eyes wide. “Is... is that what happened when you...”

“Yeah, it is,” said Linkle. “That’s how I learned about the swap wand.”

“That’s incredible,” said Malon as she let go of the wand. “I can’t wait to see the wand in action.”

Malon then frowned slightly, and looked down and began hefting her udder.

“What is it?” Linkle asked, a feeling of dread settling into her stomach.

“My... my udder,” said Malon. “I’ve always had an udder... haven’t I?”

“W-why do you ask?” said Linkle.

“Ever since I touched the wand, I keep getting new memories,” Malon said. “Memories of a life where I didn’t have an udder. But that’s impossible, right? I mean, I know it’s unusual for a Hylian to have an udder, but I was born with this udder. Why is the wand giving me memories of a life that’s not mine?”

“Um... well...” said Linkle, sweating nervously.

“Wait,” said Malon, looking up at Linkle as her frown deepened. “Did you have something to do with this?”

Linkle sighed heavily. “You know how I said tried a few swaps out earlier, to see if the wand works?” she said, and Malon nodded. “Well, the first swap I did was with one of my Cuccos. Specifically, I swapped lives with the Cucco. The Cucco was wearing my clothes and acting like I normally did, and I had to act like a normal Cucco... and since a normal Cucco has to lay eggs, the wand altered my body so that I could lay eggs too.”

“I guess that makes sense,” said Malon. “But... you’ve always laid eggs... haven’t you? Why would the wand need to alter you...?”

“Actually, before I used the wand, I’d never laid an egg in my life,” said Linkle. “After living as a Cucco for a while, I swapped back into my own life. I thought I was back to normal, but then I laid an egg as a regular Hylian.”

Linkle paused for a second, examining the wand in her hand. “The wand had to physically alter my body so I could live the life of a Cucco. However, those changes were permanent, and carried over when I swapped back into my own life. The power of the wand means that everyone accepts the change to my life as normal.”

“So, the wand made you lay eggs...” said Malon, looking confused. “Does... does that mean you used the wand on me? Is that why I’m getting memories of a life without an udder? Is that why I even have an udder in the first place?”

“...Yes,” said Linkle, unable to meet Malon’s confused look. “I swapped your life with that of the cow that Talon was milking earlier. But I swapped you back almost immediately after.”

“Why?” Malon asked.

“Because... I felt guilty...” said Linkle. “It was wrong of me to make you act like an animal, and have an animal take your place.”

“And, since you swapped me with an animal, the wand had to change my body,” said Malon softly, rubbing her udder gently. “That’s why I can now remember a life without an udder. I remember having it for my entire life, but in reality, I’ve only had it for a short time...”

“Yes,” said Linkle. “If I’d known swapping your life with the cow’s would give you an udder, I never would’ve done it. I... I’m sorry.”

How does Malon react to learning the truth about her udder?
135332222222212333113211131112121112.title: Malon becomes aware of her udder.

choices: Malon decides to swap her udder onto Linkle
Malon decides to swap her udder onto someone else
Begrudgingly, Malon keeps the udder herself
1353322222222123331132111311121211121.content:
Linkle was ready for anything. She was ready for Malon to shout at her, to hit her, anything to express her frustration at being given a cow's udder against her will. What she got was even worse. There was no shouting or fighting, just a sad look in Malon's eyes as she stared down at the part she'd once thought was normal. "I can't believe you'd do this to me," she said quietly. Her hands hesitantly stroked her udder. It seemed to help her stay calm, but there was something that felt wholly unnatural about it now that she'd obtained her memories from before being changed.

"Malon, I'm really sorry," Linkle pleaded, desperately trying to think of what she could do to not lose her friend over a stupid mistake. "Like I said, if I'd known it'd give you an udder, I wouldn't have done it."

"But... you knew this might happen, didn't you?" Malon retorted, still refusing to meet Linkle's gaze. "You already got changed yourself from swapping lives with an animal, you knew there was a chance of it happening. But you still did it, you still swapped me with a cow. And now I'm stuck with... this." The way Malon referred to her udder was miles away from the kind way she normally spoke. Now that she knew it wasn't normal for her to have an udder, her feelings truly seemed to have changed regarding it.

"Yeah, I know. I guess I just... couldn't help myself." Linkle didn't really have a good explanation for why she'd done what she did. The temptation to use the wand was just too tantalising. Perhaps it was a good thing she's let someone else in on the secret. This way they'd be able to keep each other in check, at least once Malon had calmed down.

"Couldn't help yourself? That's all you have to say for yourself?" Mason asked, finally looking up at Linkle. Now it was Linkle's turn to look away, ashamed that she'd let the allure of the wand sway her into changing her friend in this way. Malon sighed, still disappointed and upset but unable to stay mad. "You know, the only reason I'm not more mad at you is because we're the only ones who know something's wrong."

"Look, Malon," Linkle started, forcing herself to meet Malon's upset gaze. "I don't want you to be upset with me. I showed you the wand because I wanted us to enjoy it together, as friends, and I still do. If there's anything I can do to make it up to you, please, just tell me. I'll do whatever I can so we can go back to being friends again." She hoped desperately that that would get Malon back on her side again. They had been friends for so long, it would be sad to end things here and now.

Malon crossed her arms and looked away, thinking over Linkle's offer for a moment. It wasn't long before her gaze met Linkle's once more, looking a little less sad and a little more determined. "Well, to start with, what about my udder? There's no way to undo the swap?"

"Not that I know of," Linkle replied, a little crestfallen that she'd failed on the first request. "I could probably swap it onto someone else with the wand, if you want, but if swapping back into your own life didn't get rid of it, I don't really have any ideas on how to remove it for good."

For a moment, Malon seemed to contemplate Linkle's suggestion. Linkle wasn't sure if Malon would be okay with the idea of forcing the udder onto someone else just to be rid of it, but considering the thought she was giving it, she really must not like having an udder now that she had her memories without it. It was only after offering the suggestion, and after Malon began to actively consider it, that Linkle began to realise she may have placed herself in a precarious position. Malon was upset with her for giving her an udder, and here she stood, a pristine udderless body for Malon to swap with. Mason could very easily suggest that Linkle become the one with an udder, and Linkle would have to do it if she wanted her friendship back. She could scarcely imagine what having that attached to her must feel like, and with her already having the ability to lay eggs, she'd be well on her way to becoming a veritable barnyard in the form of a single Hylian. She'd do it, though. If it meant she and Malon would be friends again, she'd accept the udder. That said, she wouldn't mind if Malon picked someone else instead.
1353322222222123331132111311121211121.title: Malon is quite upset about having an udder.

choices: Malon wants to try the wand herself.
Malon wants to see Linkle use the wand.
Before they can decide, Talon interrupts them.
1353322222222123331132111311121211122.content:
Malon was quiet for a few minutes as she ran her hand over her udder. Linkle shifted uncomfortably during Malon’s silence, and ended up putting the wand back in her pocket as she waited to see how Malon reacted.

“You know, it’s funny,” Malon said after a while. “I know the memories of my life without an udder are my real memories... but they don’t feel like my real memories. Does that make sense?”

“Actually, it sort of does,” said Linkle. “After I swapped back into my own life and started to lay eggs, I could start to remember laying eggs before, even though that hasn’t happened before today.”

“I feel the same way,” said Malon. “But in reverse, I guess. I can remember waking up this morning without having an udder... but it almost feels like that memory was added on top of my existing memories of when I woke up with an udder.”

“That’s exactly how I feel!” said Linkle. “When I think about my day yesterday, I can remember not laying an egg, but over the top of that, I also remember laying an egg that day. That’s how I can tell the memories of me laying eggs are fake. But, why do you feel like your memories of your old life are fake?”

“I think it’s for the same reason you think your memories of laying eggs are fake,” said Malon. “Remember, my udder was a natural part of my life when I touched the wand. When the wand gave me my memories of my old life, it must’ve done it in the same way it gave you memories of laying eggs.”

“Yeah, I guess that makes sense,” said Linkle. “So... you’re not mad at me for accidentally giving you an udder?”

“As far as I’m concerned, I’ve always had this udder. I know that isn’t true, but it doesn’t feel true. This,” Malon said as she placed a hand on her udder, “Is part of who I am. So no, I’m not mad with you. In fact, I’m glad you helped me see the truth. It makes me appreciate my udder all the more.”

“Thank you,” said Linkle as she reached out and hugged Malon.

“You’re welcome,” said Malon as she wrapped her arms around Linkle. “But there is something I need to say.”

“What is it?” Linkle asked.

“If you are going to swap me with a cow again... don’t swap me with a cow that my Dad is currently milking,” said Malon. “Do you have any idea how weird it is to remember being milked by my own father? I’m a grown woman, I can milk myself!”

“Sorry,” Linkle said, then broke down giggling. Malon did her best to look stern, but she soon cracked up and started to laugh as well. Eventually, the two girls managed to compose themselves, and Linkle took the wand back out of her pocket.

“Okay, so... now what do we do?” Linkle asked.
1353322222222123331132111311121211122.title: Surprisingly, Malon is okay with her udder.

choices: Malon wants to see a simple swap.
Malon wants to see a more complex swap.
Malon wants to see a really big swap.
1353322222222123331132111311121213.content:
“So, you could swap anything between any two people?” asked Malon, her eyes glued to the wand in Linkle’s hand. “Just by waving that around?”

“Yep,” said Linkle.

“Prove it,” said Malon. “Swap something between the two of us, right now.”

“Okay,” said Linkle. “What do you want me to swap? Something simple, like the colours of our hair? Maybe something a bit more complex, like our heads? Or maybe something really big, like our lives?”
1353322222222123331132111311121213.title: Malon wants to see a swap first-hand.

choices: Malon thinks she's always had blonde hair.
Malon is impressed by the swap wand's power.
13533222222221233311321113111212131.content:
“Let’s just keep it simple, for now,” said Malon. “You mentioned swapping the colour of our hair. Why don’t you try that?”

“Alright, one hair colour swap, coming up!” said Linkle as she waved the wand. Linkle felt her scalp tingling for a second, and watched as Malon’s red hair shifted in colour to match Linkle’s blonde hair. Linkle then grabbed one of the little braids on the side of her head and held it out as far as she could. She could barely see the braid, but she could see that her hair was now the same colour red that Malon’s hair had been before the swap.

“And done!” said Linkle. “What do you think?”
13533222222221233311321113111212131.title: Malon wants to see a simple swap.

choices: Linkle shows the wand to Malon.
Linkle tries using the wand on Malon.
Linkle decides to keep the wand a secret.
13533222222221233311321113112.content:
Linkle let go of the wand and pulled her hand out of her pocket. What was she thinking? She couldn’t just swap people without a care in the world, especially since there were still all sorts of potential side effects that she didn’t know about. After all, Linkle had accidentally made herself an egg-laying Hylian when she’d swapped lives with one of her Cuccos. Who knows what might happen if she did another swap? And besides, what if Malon or Talon saw her making the swap? How would they react to seeing her wave a strange wand around? As tempting as it was to make a swap, Linkle knew it was safer to resist the urge for now.

“Hey, Dad!” Malon said as she and Linkle approached him. “Linkle just got back!”

“Hi, Talon,” Linkle said, waving at him as the two women approached.

“Well, hello again, Linkle,” said Talon, smiling warmly at the two. “Welcome back.”

“Thanks,” said Linkle, smiling. “It’s good to be home again.”

“I can imagine,” said Talon. “You were gone for quite some time.”

“Yeah, I was,” said Linkle. “I saw so many different things on my journey.”

“Sounds like it’ll be quite the story,” said Talon. “Just give me a few minutes to finish the milking.”

“Sure thing,” said Linkle. Malon walked over to one side of the barn, and grabbed a few extra stools. She then brought the stools over and set them down next to Linkle. Linkle sat on one stool while Malon sat on the other. As the two sat down, Talon finished squeezing the last few drops into the bucket underneath the cow, then picked up the bucket and carried over to the other side of the barn. He poured the milk into a large metal tank, then sealed the tank shut.

“There we go,” said Talon as he walked back over to the two. “Now, Linkle, I’m sure you’re dying to tell us everything that happened.”

Linkle giggled. “Yeah, I guess I am. Anyway, when I first set off for Hyrule Castle, I ended up encountering this Skull Kid with a weird mask...”

Linkle spent well over an hour telling her story to Malon and Talon. Eventually, though, she reached the end of her tale.

“Wow,” said Malon. “That all sounds incredible!” Malon then sighed. “I wish I could’ve gone with you, but I’m no good in a fight, and Dad needs my help around the Ranch.”

“Well, if this new farmhand I’m hiring works out, you might be able to take some time to travel Hyrule yourself,” said Talon. “You could even join Linkle and head off together.”

“Sure, I’d love to travel with you,” said Linkle. “But not anytime soon. I think I’ll stay here and rest for a while.”

“Thank you,” said Malon as she hugged her father. “Are you going to need a hand bottling the milk?”

“No, I’ll manage by myself,” said Talon. “You and Linkle can go and enjoy yourselves.”

“We will,” Malon said, as she and Linkle began to walk out of the barn. As they walked, Linkle’s mind again drifted to the wand in her pocket. She hadn’t used it since she’d swapped with the Cucco earlier, and accidentally given herself the ability to lay eggs. While Linkle had come to terms with the change to her body, the fact that the swap wand could cause such radical changes to someone made her a little hesitant to use it, despite how tempting it could be. She desperately wanted to see more of what the wand could do, though. Maybe she should tell Malon about the wand. Malon would be more than willing to tell Linkle if she was going too far. Who knows? Maybe Malon would be interested in using the swap wand as well.

“Linkle?” Malon asked, looking at her with concern. “Are you okay?”

“Hmm?” said Linkle, blinking in surprise at the sound of Malon’s voice. “Oh, sorry. Yeah, I’m okay. I was just... thinking about something...”

“What is it?” Malon asked.

Linkle hesitated slightly. What did Linkle decide to do?
13533222222221233311321113112.title: Linkle doesn't make any swaps yet.

choices: Malon wants to see Linkle swap something.
Malon wants to try the wand herself.
Before Malon can decide, Talon interrupts.
135332222222212333113211131121.content:
Linkle briefly looked around to make sure Talon wasn’t watching, then she reached into her pocket.

“Here,” said Linkle as she pulled out the wand. “Have a look at this.”

“Ooh,” said Malon. “Is that a magic wand?”

“Yep!” said Linkle. “Using this, I can swap anything between any two people, and nobody will ever know the difference.”

Malon gasped as her eyes went wide. “Really? Are you sure?”

“Yeah, I tested it by swapping lives with a Cucco earlier,” said Linkle. “The Cucco was acting like it was me, and she was even wearing my clothes. Not only that, but I could only cluck like a Cucco, and I had a Hylian-sized nest in the coop. After being a Cucco for a little bit, I decided to swap back into my own life again.”

“Whoa,” said Malon as she looked at the wand. “How did you find it? It must’ve been hidden really well.”

“Actually, I, uh... I tripped over it on the way home,” said Linkle, rubbing the back of her neck sheepishly.

“...Really?” said Malon, looking confused. “You just... found it?”

“Um, yeah,” said Linkle.

“Are you sure this is real?” Malon asked.

“Yes, it’s real,” said Linkle. “I know how unbelievable this all sounds, but it really does work, I promise.”

“If you say so,” said Malon, sounding slightly sceptical.

“I can swap something between us, if you want to see how it works,” said Linkle.

“Hmm,” said Malon as she thought.
135332222222212333113211131121.title: Linkle shows the wand to Malon.

choices: Malon still wants to try the wand.
Malon decides to give the wand back to Linkle.
1353322222222123331132111311212.content:
“C...can I try the wand myself?” Malon asked. “Please?”

“Well... okay,” said Linkle. “Just be careful what you swap. It could have some... weird side effects.”

“Side effects?” Malon asked. “Like what?”

“You know how I said I swapped lives with a Cucco?” Linkle said, and Malon nodded. “Well, Cuccos have to lay eggs, which meant that while I was a Cucco, I had to lay eggs too.”

“That makes sense,” said Malon. “But don’t you lay eggs anyway? I can’t see how that would’ve been a big deal.”

“That’s the thing,” said Linkle. “I’ve never laid an egg before today. When I swapped lives with the Cucco, the wand altered my body so I could lay eggs. When I swapped back into my life, the changes to my body remained, which means that I now lay eggs, even though I’m living the life of a regular Hylian.”

“But... you’ve always laid eggs,” said Malon. “For as long as I’ve known you, you’ve laid at least one egg every day.”

“Think about it, Malon,” said Linkle. “How weird is it that I am the only Hylian who has ever laid eggs?”

“I mean... it is pretty weird,” said Malon. “But it’s just how you’ve always been... isn’t it?”

“It’s not,” said Linkle. “Today is the first day I’ve ever laid an egg, and it happened because I swapped lives with a Cucco.”

“Are you sure about that?” said Malon. “I’m still not sure I believe you.”

“You wanted to try the wand yourself, right?” said Linkle, holding the swap wand out. “Go ahead and take it. You’ll see what I’m talking about.”

Hesitantly, Malon reached her hand out and picked up the wand. As her fingers closed around the wand, her eyes went wide in surprise.

“By the Goddess,” Malon whispered. “Did... did you see all that when you...?”

“You mean, all that information about how the wand works? Yeah, I did,” said Linkle. “Do you believe me now?”

“I do,” said Malon, looking at the wand in her hands. “Linkle, this thing is amazing! I...” Her voice trailed off as she looked at Linkle. “Wait... you said you lay eggs now?! I-I can’t believe I thought that was normal! Linkle, you lay eggs!”

“Yeah, I know,” said Linkle. “It’s pretty cool, right?”

“It – wait, what?” said Malon, looking confused. “Do you... do you enjoy laying eggs?”

“Uh... maybe?” said Linkle, feeling a blush heating up her cheeks. “I mean, I know it’s weird, but... something about that weirdness... for some reason, it’s really exciting. Besides, I don’t have much of a choice, do I? It’s just something I have to live with now.”

“Oh,” said Malon, looking at the wand in her hands. “Okay... so you weren’t lying...”

“No, I wasn’t,” said Linkle. “So, do you still want to try out the wand for yourself?”
1353322222222123331132111311212.title: Malon wants to try the wand herself.

choices: Malon swaps something with one of her cows.
Malon swaps something with one of Linkle's Cuccos.
Malon decides to swap with someone else...
13533222222221233311321113112121.content:
Malon slowly took a deep breath. She was still shocked to realise that Linkle now laid eggs, and even more surprised to learn that, until she’d touched the wand, Malon had thought that was normal. Such a tiny little thing held a huge amount of power. It was honestly a little terrifying... but she still wanted to see how it worked for herself.

“Yeah,” Malon said. “I still want to use the wand.”

“Great!” said Linkle. “So, who do you want to swap with, and what do you want to swap?”
13533222222221233311321113112121.title: Malon still wants to try the wand.

choices: Malon swaps something else with Linkle...
135332222222212333113211131121211.content:
“Well, uh, can I swap something with you?” Malon asked.

“Sure, go ahead!” Linkle said with a smile. “What did you want to swap?”

“I... I don’t know,” said Malon. “But, I do know that I don’t want to try swapping lives with you. Not yet, at least.”

“Yeah, okay,” said Linkle, sounding slightly disappointed. “I guess not everyone likes the idea of laying eggs.”

“Well, the wand might not change my body to lay eggs if we swap lives,” said Malon. “That might not be an important part of your life.”

“Maybe,” said Linkle. “But, I think I might know a way to find out if you enjoy laying eggs or not.”

“Huh?” said Malon.

“We could do a body swap,” said Linkle. “You’d have my body, and I’d have yours. Hopefully, the wand doesn’t alter your body to fit my life if we do a body swap.”

“I don’t know,” said Malon. “I’m not sure I’m ready to take that sort of risk...”

“It’s okay,” said Linkle. “There’s still a lot we don’t know, so being careful is probably the smart choice.”

Malon nodded, then an idea came to her. “Ooh! We could swap clothes. That should be pretty safe.”

“Yeah, I guess,” said Linkle. “A bit boring for my tastes, but it should work.”

“Using a magic wand to change reality so that we wear each others clothing is ‘boring’, is it?” Malon said, doing her best to look serious. However, her efforts were undermined by the barely suppressed smile on her face.

“Heh, yeah, a little,” Linkle said with a giggle. “How about we swap jobs? I could be working here, and you’d be the one managing my Cucco farm.”

“That could have all sorts of changes to our lives,” said Malon. “I mean, would you still live on the Cucco ranch, even though you don’t work there?”

“I don’t know,” said Linkle. “But you could find out by making the swap.”

“How about something a little less life-changing?” said Malon. “Like maybe... ooh! I could swap our names! Do you think that might be possible?”

“A name swap?” Linkle asked. “Actually, that could be pretty interesting, assuming it actually works.”

“Well, you swapped lives with a Cucco, right?” Malon asked, and Linkle nodded. “Lives aren’t exactly a physical thing, are they? It’s just how you act and what you do. And since you were able to swap that with someone, I should be able to swap something like a name, right?”

“Yeah, I don’t see why not,” said Linkle with a shrug. “So, what do you want to swap with me? Bodies? Clothes? Jobs? Names? Something else, maybe?”
135332222222212333113211131121211.title: Malon swaps something with Linkle.

choices: Malon swaps something with a wild stallion
Malon swaps something with Princess Zelda
135332222222212333113211131121215.content: “Great!” said Linkle. “So, who do you want to swap with, and what do you want to swap?”
135332222222212333113211131121215.title: Malon decides to swap with someone else...

1353322222222123331132111311212151.content:
Malon thought about it for a moment. It was a tough decision for her, as there were so many possible choices for her to swap with. A rustle in the nearby bushes snapped her out of her thoughts. She looked at where the noise had come from and saw a wild stallion appearing from behind the trees. That was when Malon made her choice.

"I think I want to swap something with that stallion over there," she told Linkle.

Linkle looked at her strangely. "Are you sure?" she asked. "I could understand it if you wanted to swap with a Cucco, or a cow; They're at least the same gender as you..."

"Exactly," argued Malon. "And where is the fun in that? If this wand is as powerful as you say, then it would be a much better test to see just HOW powerful."

Linkle still looked like she didn't approve of the idea, but eventually she relented.

"Alright," she said. "I still think you are more than a little mad for wanting to swap something with a stallion, but it's your call. Though, to be honest, she admitted, "I am curious to see what to decide to swap with it."

That sent Malon back into deep thoughts. She did want to use the Swap Wand on the stallion, but she hadn't yet decided on what to swap between them.

The first thing that came to mind was to try and swap lives with the horse, just as Linkle had done with the Cucoo before. But there was one big thing that caused her to falter.

When Linkle had swapped lives with the Cucoo, her body had altered itself so that she was able to lay eggs; a change that was carried over to her normal life when she swapped back. So, if she herself were to swap lives with a (decidedly well hung) male stallion, it would stand to reason that she would end up getting a massive 'package' so she could adjust to its life; something which would likely end up being transferred to her normal life when she'd swap back.

Malon shuddered at the thought of having a massive pair of 'boy bits' between her legs, but when she started to think more about it, it actually began to seem like an interesting situation after all. Since reality would be altered to make every change seem normal to others, there wouldn't be anyone who'd think that it was wrong for her to have the 'bits' of a stallion.

Then again, such a drastic change was perhaps better suited for a second swap; she was unsure of whether the Wand actually worked. As Malon thought of a slightly less drastic change, the wind caused her clothes to gently sway. That's when she got another idea.

She could try to swap her clothes with the stallion instead! Sure; she would end up naked, but the thought of seeing a horse dressed in her clothes was really amusing to her.

Eventually she decided to...
1353322222222123331132111311212151.title: Malon swaps something with a wild stallion

choices: The life swap didn't change Malon's body
The life swap gives Malon the stallion's "boy bits"
The life swap changes Malon in some other way
13533222222221233311321113112121511.content:
After a bit of hesitation, Malon finally announced, "I think I'm going to try swapping lives with it." She couldn't help but be interested in the way Linkle had described swapping lived with a Cucco before. Seeing an animal talk and act like her, while everyone saw her as an animal and she had to live out the life of one, lack of clothes and talking and all, it all just seemed to fascinating to her for some reason.

Linkle seemed a little less enthusiastic, however. "Um, not to rain on your parade, Malon, you can swap but you want, but are you sure about this? I mean, swapping lives with an animal is how I got stuck laying eggs."

"I know," Malon replied cheerfully. "But that's what's so exciting! You said yourself the weirdness of laying eggs as a Hylian was exciting to you, didn't you?"

"I mean, yeah, I guess," Linkle said a little sheepishly.

"Well, this is exciting for me too. And that's why I want to swap with that horse."

"And you're still going to be as excited if the swap ends up giving you big ol' horse d-"

"We'll cross that bridge when we get to it," Malon quickly interrupted, blushing a bit at the thought of what Linkle was suggesting. She had to admit, while it seemed a little daunting, it was also quite exciting. "Besides, we don't even know if it'll change me like that. You started laying eggs because laying eggs is important for being a Cucco, who's to say if the wand thinks having boy bits is important enough for swapping lives with a boy?"

"Well, only one way to find out, huh?" Linkle said, reassuringly patting Malon on the shoulder. "Don't worry, I'll make sure the horse doesn't do anything dumb while it's in your life."

"...Won't it just act like me, though?"

"...I mean, yeah, but still." The pair shared a chuckle at that.

"Alright, here goes," Malon said once they'd stopped laughing, raising the wand. She felt a little silly doing this, but she was sure it would work. After all, she'd seen all the information when she picked up the wand, and she knew Linkle's ability to lay eggs was strange. Things were about to get wild.

With just a moment of hesitation, Malon waved the wand, thinking about swapping lives with the wild stallion.
13533222222221233311321113112121511.title: ...swap lives with the stallion

choices: Malon swaps back to her own life
Malon decides to stay a stallion
Malon swaps into a different life again
135332222222212333113211131121215112.content:
As Malon waved the wand, she disorientingly found herself suddenly standing somewhere else. She could immediately feel the differences, but before she got a chance to examine herself, her attention was caught by what stood right in front of her. Standing beside Linkle, whose eyes were wide and face was bright red, was the stallion, now clothed in her dress and boots. It was a somewhat amusing sight, but the fact that she could see her clothes on the horse only drew attention to the breeze she could feel running across her body.

"I wonder if he belongs to anyone," the stallion said, speaking in perfect Hylian. Clearly it believed that it was having a conversation with Linkle regarding the horse that had just shown up, seeing as it had no memory of the swap wand, which Malon could still feel being held in her hand.

"I, uh, I doubt it. I don't think I've, um, seen him on any of the nearby farms," Linkle mumbled in reply, stumbling over her words little as she embarrassingly tried, and failed, to keep her eyes off of something. Malon knew what she was looking at. She could feel it since the moment she swapped, she was just hesitating looking at it.

She could hesitate no longer, though. Casting her gaze downwards, she saw that, with her dress being worn by the horse, she was now completely naked. She blushed a little, her hands reaching up to cover her bare breasts to retain at least some modicum of modesty. She didn't bother covering her nether regions, though, already knowing there was absolutely no chance of her hiding what lay there. Even within its sheath, her new genitalia was massive, there was no other word for it. Though she was much smaller than the horse, it seemed its privates had not been proportionally adjusted to match, rather keeping the same size it had previously been, rather too large for her, although she supposed that any size would still feel strange. Even the testes that sat behind her member felt like they were almost the size of her fist. It was all a little ridiculous, and quite embarrassing, a blush gracing her face, though not quite as strongly as Linkle's.

Despite how strange it was though, she couldn't deny that she was still feeling the same excitement she'd been feeling before the swap. Bizarre as it felt to have a horse's giant boy bits nestled between her legs, it wasn't uncomfortable exactly, and she couldn't help but feel a little giddy that no one would see anything wrong with it, dwarfing any feelings of awkwardness. Well, almost no one. Linkle could obviously see reality for how it really was, seeing her as a naked Hylian with a stallion's genitals, but to everyone else, she was an ordinary wild stallion. Perhaps she would come to regret this decision once the excitement was worn off, but for now, she was enjoying every second of this. Although, perhaps she was enjoying this a little too much. All this excitement seemed to be stimulating the one part of her that she definitely did not want being stimulated what Linkle was still watching.It was only then that her blush grew more intense as she fidgeted with her legs, trying to stop herself from unintentionally unsheathing.

"He seems a bit distressed," the stallion in Malon's life observed, noting Malon's behaviour. "Maybe he's lost?" It slowly trotted up to her, an odd dissonance between the sound of its bare front hooves and boot-clad back hooves. Malon was suddenly glad she'd swapped with a wild horse and not one of the horses on the ranch; she didn't really want to imagine what it would be like to have horseshoes bolted to her feet. "There there, it's alright," the stallion said, gently rubbing its snout against her arm. It felt surprisingly nice. Malon supposed this must be what it felt like for the horses when she hand her hand through their manes.

"H-Hey, maybe you should ask Talon if you can keep him at the ranch for now? Just until we, uh, figure out if he belongs to someone, or what to do with him," Linkle suggested. Truthfully, she just wanted a chance to speak to Malon without the horse in her life being around, but it seemed like a convincing enough excuse. The talk of the horse having an owner did seem to trigger something in Malon though, as she realised that she actually had the horse's memories. She supposed that made sense, seeing as she was supposed to be living the horse's life now, but it was still somewhat amazing that she could remember things from someone else's perspective. In particular, she could tell that this horse was definitely a wild animal, and the equipment she now possessed had definitely been used before, causing yet more blushing.

"Ooh! That's a good idea. I'll be right back," the horse said, turning back towards Linkle again.

"Sure. I'll, um, I'll wait here to make sure he doesn't run off."

"Alright, thanks!" With not a word more, the horse ran off in an awkward gallop, dress swishing about around its legs.

The moment the horse was out of earshot, Linkle turned back to Malon again, her face still tinged red. "Well, this is awkward," she half mumbled, eyes still occasionally drawn to Malon's new additions.

"You can say that again," Malon tried to say, but all that came out what a horse-like whinny. Her eyes went wide as she reached up to her mouth with her free hand. Despite the horse speaking like a Hylian, she somehow hadn't realised that she would have the voice of a horse now.

Malon's reaction elicited a chuckle from Linkle. "Oh, right, you're a horse now." She slowly approached, finding it easier to keep her eyes on Malon's face if she was closer. "I'd ask how you're feeling but I wouldn't be able to understand you." That was a definite downside of this swap; her friend, the one who had introduced her to the wand in the first place, couldn't understand a word she said. Perhaps if they were both animals it would work, but she wasn't sure if Linkle would want to go another round after her first swap had left her laying eggs. "Are you enjoying yourself at least?"

Malon hesitated for a moment, but ultimately smiled and nodded. The excitement from this bizzarre situation hadn't worn off yet, so even being saddled with a horse's genitals, she couldn't say she wasn't enjoying herself.

"Really?" Linkle said, a little surprised. She did recall having a little fun when she tried out being a Cucco for a while, but she didn't see her egg-laying abilities on quite the same level as the way Linkle had been changed. "It's not weird or uncomfortable or anything?"

Malon waggled her head in something of a sideways nod. She wouldn't call it uncomfortable, but it was certainly weird. A good kind of weird though, not the off-putting kind.

"Huh." Linkle was feeling pretty good about her decision to tell Malon about the wand right now. She had expected Malon to be a little hesitant about messing with something so powerful, but instead she'd jumped right in the deep end with something even weirder than Linkle had tried, and she seemed to be loving it so far. Linkle was now sure they'd be able to have a lot of fun together with this thing, but there was one thing standing in the way; while there was nothing strange about Linkle and Malon spending time together, people would probably start to question things if they saw Linkle wandering around town talking to a wild horse, to say nothing of the fact that she couldn't understand Malon at the moment. Something would have to change. "So, you wanna swap back and see if... this sticks around?" Linkle asked. It would be easier to understand Malon if they were the same species, and Linkle wasn't exactly eager to become a horse just yet.

Malon mulled it over for a moment. She did rather like the idea of being a wild animal, roaming free, the breeze blowing across her body, but she could see the downsides. Along with Linkle being unable to understand her, everyone besides Linkle simply saw her as an ordinary horse, and would treat her as such. It limited what she could do a bit. However, she wasn't sure she wanted this experiment just yet. Strange as it may be, she was actually enjoying the weirdness of her new package, and she was a little worried about it vanishing when she swapped back. Linkle may not have changed back to normal, "not laying eggs" apparently not being deemed an important enough part of being a Hylian, but she couldn't see if the stallion was still as well hung as it had previously been, its privates hidden behind what was once her dress, so she couldn't tell if "not having boy bits" was considered as important to being a female Hylian as having them was to being a stallion. However, before she could decide, another idea came to her; what if she swapped lives, but not back into her own? Who said she had to go back to being herself just yet? Even if she didn't want to be a horse, she could be someone else for a while. Or perhaps she could find another animal to swap with, and see how it and the horse would behave, believing they were a different species. The only trouble is that would leave things yet more jumbled, and possible permanently affect herself or others, so she'd have to be a little careful if she went this route.

"Actually, I was thinking about that," Malon interjected, having mulled it over while she was coming back over. "See, when I was in the horse's life, I realised I had its memories, as if I had been it all my life."

"Wait, really?" Linkle said, somewhat surprised. She supposed it made sense that you'd need someone's memories in order to live their life, but somehow she hadn't seen that coming.

"Yeah. Was it not the same for you with the cucco?"

"I mean, I don't remember having its memories. There was a lot to take in about being a cucco, though. Maybe I just missed it."

"Well, anyway, I realised that the stallion... well, it's mated before."

"Oh? ...Oh!" Linkle's face turned red again as she realised what Malon was saying, and briefly pondered how much Malon had seen in the horse's memories.

"Yeah. Well, I was thinking, the stallion couldn't have mated the way it did without its "boy bits"," Malon explained, still not using the proper name for her new parts. "But I haven't had any children, so maybe my parts weren't as important for my life as the stallion's were for his."
