"I mean, I guess. This feels different, though." Linkle had to admit it was strange that her body was now designed to push eggs out of her vagina, but the fact that Malon now possessed a set of male genitalia, let alone one as large as a horse's, seemed significantly more strange and awkward to her. She wasn't about to try and convince Malon of that, though, with how much she seemed to be enjoying it.

"Anyway, what do you want to do now?"

"I'm guessing you're not done with the wand yet?" Linkle replied, doing her best to put Malon's new parts out of her mind. Perhaps she'd eventually learn to treat it as normally as everyone else in the world now did.

"Linkle, we have a magic wand capable of swapping anything with anyone, and the only thing we've done with it is temporarily swap lives with a couple of animals. Of course I'm not done with it, just think about everything we can still do!"

This elicited a chuckle from Linkle. "Hehe, I'm glad you're getting so into this. So, you wanna head into town and see who we can swap with?"

"We could." Malon pondered, thinking about all the people in the nearby town that they could use the wand on. "I'd have to ask my dad, though. We could always just stay here at the ranch. If you're okay with swapping with more animals, that is."

Did she really want to risk more swaps like that? Sure, she may be comfortable with her new egg-laying ability, but she wasn't as excited about it as Malon had been about her new parts. Would she really be comfortable if their messing around with the wand gave her, for example, a tail, or a cow's udder?

And how would the horse walk around with only two legs?

Linkle’s second idea involved swapping the horse’s tail onto Ilia. But how could she make that happen? Would Linkle have to swap the horse’s tail with Ilia’s lack of a tail?

Maybe, Linkle could instead swap Ilia’s life with that of the horse. After all, when she had swapped lives with the Cucco, the wand had altered Linkle to make her lay eggs. Maybe, if she swapped Ilia and the horse’s lives, she could see how Ilia’s body was altered by the life swap, and use that as inspiration for future swaps.

What did Linkle decide to try?
135332222222212333113211132122.title: Make a weird swap between Ilia and the horse.

choices: Swap Malon and Ilia's clothing styles.
135332222222212333113211132123.content:
As Linkle watched Malon and Ilia talk, she wondered if she could make some sort of weird swap between her two friends.

The first idea that Linkle had was to swap Malon and Ilia’s names. Linkle had no idea if the wand could swap such an abstract thing as a name, so she figured that would be a good test of the wand’s power.

Linkle’s second idea was to swap Malon and Ilia’s professions. That would make Malon a horse rancher working in Ordon Village, while Ilia would become a dairy farmer working at Lon Lon Ranch. How would that change Malon and Ilia’s lives?

The third idea Linkle came up with involved Malon and Ilia’s clothing. However, she didn’t want to simply swap Malon and Ilia’s clothing. Linkle wanted to try something a little more complicated, and swap Malon and Ilia’s preferred styles of clothing. Malon preferred to wear dresses and boots, while Ilia usually wore pants, and went barefoot. If Linkle could swap their clothing styles, then Malon would wear pants and go barefoot, but her clothes would still be her own, rather than simply Ilia’s. Likewise, Ilia would wear dresses and boots that were her own, rather than wearing Malon’s clothing.

What did Linkle decide to try?
135332222222212333113211132123.title: Make a weird swap between Malon and Ilia.

choices: Swap Malon and the cow and Ilia and the horse at the same time
Swap Malon with Ilia's horse and Ilia with Malon's cow
135332222222212333113211132124.content: What the kind of swap did Linkle decide to make?
135332222222212333113211132124.title: Something else...

choices: The swap worked, and all Hylian women now lay eggs.
The swap didn't work, and nothing happened.
1353322222222123331132111323.content:
Suddenly, a much more ambitious thought crossed Linkle’s mind. While the wand meant that no-one would find it strange for a Hylian to lay eggs, what if she wasn’t the only woman that laid eggs? A crazy idea began to form in her head, and she decided that she wanted all Hylians to swap their reproductive systems with that of Cuccos. But how would she word such a swap?

After spending a few minutes to think of the right wording, Linkle raised the wand.

“I want to swap the Hylian species’ reproductive systems with the reproductive systems of the Cucco species,” she said, and waved the wand. Once she waved the wand, she held her breath, and waited for the swap to take effect.
1353322222222123331132111323.title: Linkle makes all Hylians swap reproductive syst...

choices: Linkle continues using the Swap Wand.
Linkle puts the Swap Wand away and enjoys this new reality.
13533222222221233311321113231.content:
There was a bright flash, and Linkle felt dizzy all of a sudden. She stumbled a few steps, but quickly recovered. As the light faded, Linkle looked around her room. At first glance, everything seemed to be normal, but then Linkle noticed a padded cushion on the floor, to one side of the bed. There was an egg sitting on the bed, about the same size as the ones she had laid when she was a Cucco and when she had a Cucco’s reproductive system.

“Did... did it work?” Linkle asked herself quietly as she put the wand down. Linkle then looked out her window, and strangely, she saw that a barn had replaced her Cucco coop. She could hear cows mooing in the barn, and Linkle frowned. Since when did she own cows?

Linkle noticed a book resting on her bedside table, and she picked it up. It was an old book, one she’d had for years, that had taught her how to properly take care of farm animals, including Cuccos. She quickly turned to the pages on Cuccos and started reading. However, the text about Cuccos was now completely different, and said that Cuccos were the only bird to give birth to live young, and that they were only raised for their meat.

“Haha! It worked!” said Linkle, jumping up and down in excitement. Once her excitement faded, she turned her attention back to the book, and quickly read the section on cows. As she read it, she felt new memories forming in her mind. All of a sudden, she could remember laying eggs all her life, and taking care of cows at her ranch, even though she hadn’t done either of those things before today. Despite suddenly gaining a lifetime’s worth of memories, she found she could easily tell which memories were from her original life, and which memories were from the new reality.

“Huh,” said Linkle, putting the book down. “I guess the wand is giving me memories of this new reality. That’s pretty cool.”

Once she put the book down, Linkle turned her attention back to the wand. What did she do next?
13533222222221233311321113231.title: The swap worked, and all Hylian women now lay e...

135332222222212333113211132312.content:
Linkle put the wand away in the drawer of her bedside table. She didn’t want to leave it out in the open when she wasn’t using it, after all.

After putting the wand away, Linkle decided to go out into the village, and let people know she was back. She spent a few hours walking through the town, saying hello to people and telling everyone what had happened on her journey. As she travelled through town, she noticed a woman that had been pregnant when she had left for Hyrule Castle. Now, the woman was carrying a basket, and in that basket, wrapped in blankets, was a large, baby sized egg. As Linkle watched, the egg started to crack, and the woman gasped.

“Oh! The baby’s coming!” said the woman, as the cracks grew larger. A section of the egg broke off, and a tiny hand poked out of the hole. The egg continued to crack, and slowly fell apart, revealing a healthy young baby. The baby began to cry once the egg was broken, and the new mother cooed as she gently took the broken shards of egg shell out of the basket.

Watching from a distance, Linkle had to struggle not to laugh. While this may have seen normal to everyone else, none of them realised that this was the first time anything like this had happened before, and it was all because of Linkle. Linkle joined the crowd of onlookers and well-wishers, congratulating the mother for incubating her egg. That was when Linkle gained more memories from this new reality.

All of a sudden, Linkle could remember learning that Hylian women laid one or two eggs every day, and that if a woman went for more than five days without laying an egg, it meant she was pregnant. Over the course of a single month, a pregnant Hylian woman would reach full term, and would lay a large egg, roughly the size of her baby. The woman would then have to incubate the egg for eight months, after which the egg would hatch. Linkle could also now remember that a Hylian woman was considered pregnant until the egg hatched, rather than when the egg was laid.

After watching the baby hatching and congratulating the new mother, Linkle returned home. She spent the rest of the day at home, and, after all the excitement of using the Swap Wand, Linkle decided to get an early night’s sleep.
135332222222212333113211132312.title: Linkle puts the Swap Wand away and enjoys this ...

choices: Linkle doesn't use the Swap Wand.
1353322222222123331132111323122.content:
Linkle woke up just after dawn the next morning. She yawned as she sat up and stretched. She lazily climbed out of bed, and walked over to the padded cushion beside her bed. Linkle pulled her panties down and squatted over the cushion. Once she was over the cushion, she laid her morning eggs, pushing four eggs out of her vagina. Another new memory rose into Linkle’s mind, and she could now remember that some Hylian women, including herself, would lay many more eggs than average. In fact, Linkle could now remember laying twelve eggs in a single sitting, and laying twenty eggs over the course of a single day, despite the fact that neither event had actually happened.

She also began to remember selling her excess eggs, and that Hylians would use the eggs that were laid by Hylian women in their cooking. That seemed weird to Linkle, but it did make sense. After all, if Cuccos no longer laid eggs, then people would have to get eggs from somewhere else. Since Hylian women now provided a steady supply of eggs, it wasn’t surprising that people would use those eggs instead. Not only that, but since Hylian women carried fertilised eggs for a month before laying them, and fertilised eggs were much larger than unfertilised ones, it was easy to tell which was which.

Once she finished laying her eggs, Linkle pulled her panties up, then got dressed for the day. Linkle made herself some breakfast, and even used one of her eggs for it. Once she’d eaten, she went out and checked up on the cows she now had. Linkle found it surprisingly easy to milk the cows, and she figured that the Swap Wand had given her the skills she needed after altering her life so radically. Once she’d finished milking the cows, she bottled the milk, ready to sell it in town later that afternoon. When she finished a few hours later, she returned to her house to sit down and rest for a while.

It was getting close to midday, and Linkle felt a familiar pressure building up as she walked through her house. Linkle didn’t even bother to pull her panties down, and simply squatted and pushed a single egg out of her vagina. Once she’d laid the egg, Linkle reached into her panties and pulled the egg out, then put it with the others she planned to sell. She had gotten used to laying eggs surprisingly quickly, and she was even starting to get a sense of how many eggs she’d lay in a single sitting.

After laying her midday egg, Linkle decided to have some lunch. As she ate, she remembered that the Swap Wand was still in the drawer of her bedside table. Maybe she could try using it again...
1353322222222123331132111323122.title: The next morning...

choices: Linkle swapped voices with the Cucco.
Linkle swapped clothes with the Cucco.
Linkle swapped something else with the Cucco...
1353322222222123331132113.content:
To her surprise, Linkle realised that she actually enjoyed being a Cucco, and she had no desire to give up her body. Maybe she could swap something that would make her life as a Cucco a little easier. Maybe she could swap voices with the Cucco, so she could speak like a Hylian again, and the Cucco would go back to simply clucking.

Or, maybe she could swap clothes with the Cucco. While she didn’t mind being naked right now, Linkle knew it could get quite cold at night, and she didn’t have feathers to keep her warm. Swapping clothes with the Cucco would give Linkle her old clothes back, and the Cucco living her life would be naked. Or, she could swap something else...
1353322222222123331132113.title: Linkle swapped something else with the Cucco...

144.content:
Midna sighed as she sat by the fire. She and Link had been searching for the Fused Shadows for a couple of days now and had finally gotten them all. They had just gotten the Master Sword from the Sacred Grove and turned Link back into a human. They were resting for the night and Link was currectly asleep in his wolf form. She glared at him and floated out of camp. She wanted to make her serve her. She wanted him to worship her. Just as she was going through a list of what she wanted Link to do, something fell from the sky and hit her over the head.

She looked down at what hit her and saw that it was a strange stick. Curiously, she reached down and picked it up. Her mind instantly filled with knowledge about what this was. It was the legendary Swap Wand. She could twist the very fabric of reality with just a wave of this thing.

She smiled as she thought about what she could do to Link with it. She could finally make him do what she wanted. She could make him act like a girl. She could actually make him a girl. She then paused and thought about the girls she'd seen on their journey. What most people or twili didn't know was that Midna was bisexual. There was Princess Zelda. Midna almost had an orgasm just thinking about how she could see the Hylian Princess treating her like a god. She then thought about the pregnant wife of that swordsman that Link had stolen his first sword from, Uli. Midna giggled at the thought of seeing a pregnant human serve her again and again.

info.brief_description: Zelda characters find a magical wand
info.description: Read the first chapter for some information on the wand, the setup, and so on. Let's try to keep the number of branches in this one down. There's no need to pick a game before choosing a character; all the toon games cross over with each other, and so do all the non-toon ones.
